name: Questr (itch)
description:
You are hired as an intern working for the company Questr. You manage an online matching system for quests. Certain fantasy heroes don’t along and your job is to create the perfect team.

Make sure to read the documentation for instructions on how to operate the software!

Credit: Yamato Ryuo for the original composition of Metropolis, which was remastered and edited for the game's soundtrack.
